modules.name: cardsupport

modules.description: An Odyssey of the Dragonlords flavored UI for Foundry VTT.  Based on Fantasy UI by iotech.

modules.name: tokenmagic
modules.title: Token Magic FX
modules.description: Add special effects and animations on your tokens, tiles, drawings and templates.

modules.name: vance-sidebar-resizer
modules.title: Vance's Sidebar Resizer
modules.description: Allows drag resizing of the sidebar (chat, actors, etc)
modules.author: Vance Cole

modules.name: VariantEncumbrance
modules.title: Variant Encumbrance
modules.description: A module for D&D 5th Edition, to automatically modify character carry weights to match the Variant Encumbrance optional rule set.

modules.name: custom-journal
modules.title: Custom Journal

modules.name: swade-cyber-css

modules.description: A character sheet theme for SWADE

modules.name: swade-book-css

modules.description: A character sheet theme for SWADE
modules.author: Kyane

modules.name: coloredeffects
modules.title: Colored Effects
modules.description: Adds settings to control the display of status and overlay icons on tokens
modules.author: Sean Wellington

modules.name: simplefog
modules.title: Simplefog - Manual Fog of War
modules.description: Simplefog allows you to draw fog of war manually, optionally automatically hiding and revealing tokens underneath based on opacity. It provides a number of tools to quickly draw and erase fog in various shapes - brush, rectangles, ellipses, polygons or to reveal tiles you click/drag on the grid.
modules.author: Vance Cole

modules.name: one-journal
modules.title: OneJournal
modules.description: OneJournal provides a unified view for authoring journals
modules.author: Sunspots

modules.name: dd-import
modules.title: Dungeondraft Importer
modules.description: Imports scene elements from Dungeondraft map files
modules.author: Moo Man, m42e, jacquie

modules.name: dndbeyond-character-sheet
modules.title: DNDBeyond Character Sheet for 5E
modules.description: This module adds an additional character sheet inspired by DNDBeyond and the Obsidian character sheet.
modules.author: Jan Ole Peek (ChalkOne)

modules.name: token-action-hud
modules.title: Token Action HUD
modules.author: ^ and stick#0520
modules.description: Creates a bar showing a selected token's actions.

modules.name: tidy5e-sheet
modules.title: Tidy5e Sheet
modules.description: Replaces the default D&D 5e character and NPC sheet with an alternate layout focused on a cleaner UI
modules.author: sdenec#3813

modules.name: WhisperBox
modules.title: Whisper Box
modules.description: A module that allows you to create a dedicated whisper window (with history, and per player, if desired).
modules.author: Richard Bellingham (Skimble)

modules.name: polyglot
modules.title: Polyglot
modules.description: Talk to others using a language you can speak and scrambles text you can't understand, in several fantasy scripts.

elizeuangelo

modules.name: betterrolls-swade
modules.title: Better Rolls for Savage Worlds

modules.name: returntosetup

modules.name: chat-alias
modules.title: Chat Alias
modules.description: Apply automatic replace on chat message. Customizable by regular expressions.

modules.name: pick-up-stix
modules.title: Pick-Up-Stix
modules.description: Allows Items to be placed on the map as Tokens that players are able to pick up.

modules.name: tweakplaylist
modules.title: Tweak Playlist

modules.description: This module allows adjustments to the appearance of the FOW.

iotech
Limping Ninja

modules.name: better-text-drawings
modules.title: Better Text Drawings
modules.description: Adds more options to text drawings, allowing multi-line text as well as configurable stroke width, color, and text alignment.

modules.name: navbar-tweaks
modules.title: Navbar Tweaks
modules.description: Provides some tweaks for the Navbar
modules.author: Rui Pinheiro

modules.name: token-vision-tweaks
modules.title: Token Vision Tweaks
modules.description: Provides some tweaks for Token Vision, to allow trading quality for performance, or vice-versa. Also provides a fix for a vision issue present in large open maps which may cause tokens to be able to see through distant walls, as well as a Fog-of-War memory leak.
modules.author: Rui Pinheiro

modules.name: macro-folders
modules.title: Macro Folders

modules.name: externalactor
modules.title: External Actor Viewer
modules.description: Makes you able to see characters from unloaded worlds.
modules.author: ardittristan#0001

modules.name: BetterAmbientLoop
modules.title: Better Ambient Loop by Blitz
modules.description: Alters the howler soundsprite end point to eliminate the short silence in ambient audio clips
modules.author: Blitzkraig

modules.name: journal-sync
modules.title: Journal Sync
modules.description: This module allows you to sync your journal entries with markdown files to give you more flexibility in editing your notes.

modules.name: foundry-drmapzo-free
modules.title: Dr. Mapzo free maps (unofficial)

modules.name: TinyTokens

modules.description: Support for 'tiny' creature tokens, taking up 1/4 of a square each

modules.name: find-the-culprit
modules.title: Find the culprit
modules.description:
This module helps you to find a module causing issues, by automating the process of deactivating and reactivating modules.
Just click the 'Find the culprit' button inside Module Management.

This is a collection of Tables added by the FoundryVTT Community!

modules.title: Token Chat Link

modules.description: Turns the name of the speaker in the chat log into a link to their token.

modules.title: Token HUD Artwork Button
modules.description: This module adds a button to the token HUD that opens the target actor's artwork, or their token artwork on right-click.

modules.name: tile-relativesize
modules.title: Relative Tile Size
modules.description: Set tiles' size relatively to grid size

modules.description: Use Jitsi to handle A/V. Connect to jitsi.org or self-hosted server.

modules.name: sadness-chan
modules.title: Sadness Chan
modules.description: A chat 'bot' for FoundryVTT that's full of 'happy' and 'motivational' messages, to pick you up when your rolls let you down.
modules.author: bmarian, HadaIonut

modules.name: dragupload
modules.title: Drag Upload (Get Over Here!)
modules.description: Adds the ability to drag files onto Foundry to automatically create Tokens, Tiles, Journal Pins, and Ambient Audio
modules.author: Cody Swendrowski <cody@swendrowski.us>

modules.name: control-concealer
modules.title: Control concealer
modules.description: Adds two customizable tabs to the controls bar(on the left) and let's you hide tools(or complete layer controls) in each of those.Should you add or remove modules after you have made a selection this will try to adapt your previous selectiong to the added or deleted tools. This is for everyone that has a lot of modules that add their tools to the layer controls on the left side and also for everyone that might have a lot of tools they use while preparing games but a lot less or different while actually playing.
modules.author: KayelGee - KayelGee#5241

modules.name: SupersHomebrewPack
modules.title: Super's Homebrew Compendium
modules.description: A module that adds additional homebrewed content for your dnd5e games. Classes, subclasses, races, feats, spells, items, you know it! Works even better when paired with Magic Items, Better Rolls and Dynamic Effects modules!
modules.author: SuperNar3k

modules.name: long-rest-hd-healing
modules.title: Long Rest Hit Die Healing for D&D5e
modules.description: Adds the "Slow Natural Healing" rules to the dnd5e system. Rather than healing to full hit points, actors now have the option to spend hit dice on a long rest.
modules.author: Cole Schultz (cole#9640)

modules.name: camera-view-settings
modules.title: Camera View Settings
modules.description: This module allows the user to change the camera view. Options are hide, names only, full.

modules.name: ose-content
modules.title: Old School Essentials OGL Content
modules.description: Open Game Licensed content from Necrotic Gnome's Old School Essentials.

modules.title: Item Macro
modules.description: A module that allows macros to be stored in items and executed in various places.

modules.description: Displays helpful (?) hints on Foundry start - contribute at https://discord.gg/yEyxJBH
modules.author: Sebastian Will

modules.name: token-hud-wildcard
modules.title: Token HUD Wildcard
modules.description: This module adds a button to the Token HUD if the token has wildcard set and detects more than 1 image to choose from. Pressing the button displays a panel on the right side of the HUD with buttons for each image, pressing one of these allows to change the token image.
modules.author: Javieros

modules.name: lootsheetnpcpf1
modules.title: Loot Sheet NPC Pathfinder1
modules.description: This module adds an additional NPC sheet which can be used for loot containers such as chests or shopkeepers.

modules.name: searchanywhere
modules.title: Search Anywhere
modules.description: Adds a way to quickly search for any entity by name via a handy auto-complete widget
modules.author: Simone

modules.name: token-attacher
modules.title: Token Attacher
modules.description: Attach anything(except other tokens) to tokens, so that they move when the token moves and rotate/move when the token rotates. To be able to attach measure templates, lights, sounds and journals you need the select-tool-everywhere module, as of writing this there is no select tool in those controls.
modules.author: KayelGee - KayelGee#5241

modules.name: ec-maps-remake-by-lios

^ and stick#0520

modules.name: bettertemplates
modules.title: Better Templates
modules.description: Allows you to set opacity of measured templates fill and stroke

modules.name: inventory-plus

modules.description: Enhances the default dnd5e sheets inventory to allow for reorganization
modules.author: Felix#6196

modules.name: select-tool-everywhere
modules.title: Select tool everywhere
modules.description: Adds the select tool to all controls(measure templates, lighting and sound) and a patch for journal notes so the select tool works there too. This is a quick and dirty module. You can move multiple light/sounds/templates/journals with this. Thanks to Blitz#6797 the selection does show correctly.  This module checks if a select tool is there before adding it(also thanks to Blitz) and makes sure to only do anything if this module added the select tool, so it should be safe to use with other modules that add a select tool. This will probably be obsolete in the future.
modules.author: KayelGee - KayelGee#5241

modules.name: simplemobile
modules.title: Simple-Mobile
modules.description: Add (somewhat) support for mobile
modules.author: Handyfon#8390

modules.title: Minor Quality of Life Improvements
modules.description: Item delete confirmation|Hide/Show chat card info|speed attack rolls

modules.title: Skill Customization for D&D5e

modules.name: macro-marker

modules.description:
Allows players and GMs to mark macros as active giving them a coloured border.

Markers can now also be toggled automatically based on any condition or script!

Check out the compendium for examples.
modules.author: Stan Janssen

modules.name: fvtt-swade-stat-block-parser
modules.title: SWADE Statblock Importer
modules.description: Copy+Paste Beastiary statblocks from any SWADE book, get it turned into an entity. 60% of the time it works every time
modules.author: spacemandev

modules.name: tabbed-chatlog
modules.title: Tabbed Chatlog
modules.description: Splits the Chatlog into In Character (per scene), Rolls (per scene), and Out of Character (global).
modules.author: Cody Swendrowski <cody@swendrowski.us>

modules.name: special-dice-roller
modules.title: Special Dice Roller
modules.description: Supports rolling dice for: Legend of the 5 Rings 5th edition, Genesys, Vampire the Masquerade 5th edition, FFG's Star Wars TTRPG, HeroQuest, HeXXen 1733. Check out the README.md on the homepage for a guide on how to roll various dice.
modules.author: Bernhard Posselt

modules.name: point-of-vision
modules.title: Point of Vision
modules.description: Allows tweaking the point(s) of origin of vision on tokens
modules.author: Eadorin (eadorin@gmail.com)

modules.name: darker-vision-for-5e
modules.title: Darker Vision for 5e
modules.description: Token dim vision now renders darkness as dim light and dim light as bright light within the token's dim vision radius.
modules.author: Voldemalort

modules.name: statblockimporter
modules.title: Stackblock Importer
modules.description: A module to convert raw Statblocks to Actors
modules.author: Lavaeolous

modules.name: world-anvil
modules.title: World Anvil Integration
modules.description: A module to integrate World Anvil with Foundry Virtual Tabletop.
modules.author: Atropos

modules.name: TokenHotbar
modules.title: Token Hotbar
modules.description: With Token Hotbar you can assign one of the hotbar pages to remember macros per token and/or actor. If the token is a linked token, the hotbar will be linked to the actor by default.
modules.author: Stan Janssen

modules.name: pings
modules.title: Pings
modules.description: Allows pinging on the map
modules.author: Azzurite#2004

modules.name: inlinewebviewer
modules.title: Inline Webviewer
modules.description: Have a webpage open inside Foundry, eg an easyzoom map.
modules.author: ardittristan#0001

modules.name: dnd-ui
modules.title: DnD5e Ui
modules.description:
Theme for DnD5e.

*** Rejoignez la communauté Discord FR : https://discord.gg/pPSDNJk
modules.author: Sasmira

modules.name: background-volume
modules.title: Background Volume
modules.description: A module for setting the volume of background videos
modules.author: Michael Volling

modules.name: token-mold
modules.title: Token Mold
modules.description:
Gives the option to cast your tokens into a mold of your choosing.

Possible options for your mold include:

  • Adding incrementing number suffixes.
  • Name generation for tokens.
  • Random adjective prefixes. (Examples: angry, calm, bloodthirsty, ...)
  • Rolling Hit Points by formula (dnd5e only)
  • Set token configuration on placement.
  • Providing an overlay to quickly check some stats on token hover.
  • Stick templates to your tokens, to let them follow your tokens movement.
  • Automatic creature size scaling (dnd5e only)
modules.author: Moerill

modules.name: forien-token-rotation
modules.title: Forien's Token Rotation
modules.description: Allows to rotate Tokens by dragging an "anchor" around token.
modules.author: Forien — Forien#2130

modules.name: furnace
modules.title: The Furnace
modules.description:
No Foundry is complete without it's Furnace!

This module contains a set of features that improve the Quality of Life of the DM/Players. The current features are :

Advanced Drawing Tools :Improved drawing tools with different pattern fill types, new HUD, and various options.

Advanced Macros: Use async script macros, handlebars templating, recursive macro calls and call macros with arguments or directly from chat.

Split Journal : Select the split option from the context menu on a journal entry to split it into multiple entries.

Tokens : As GM, you can enable/disable token vision for yourself. You can also drop an actor folder into a scene to deploy multiple tokens at once.

Combat : Double click the initiative value in the combat tracker to quickly modify it.

Playlists : Adds a 'Now Playing' section, and auto-hides sound controls until hovered. Helps in fine tuning of low level volumes.

See website from URL below for instructions on how to use all these features.
modules.author: KaKaRoTo

modules.name: forien-scene-navigator
modules.title: Forien's Scene Navigator
modules.description: Allows creating Entity Links to Activate and Open Scenes
modules.author: Forien — Forien#2130

modules.name: betterrolls5e
modules.title: Better Rolls for 5e
modules.description: This module adds special roll functionality for the D&D 5e system, allowing "dual rolls" for d20 rolls, buttons that support full output to chat, and customization for said outputs.
modules.author: Red Reign#5128

modules.name: pathfinder-ui
modules.title: Pathfinder Ui
modules.description:
Theme for Pathfinder 1e/2e.

*** Rejoignez la communauté Discord FR : https://discord.gg/pPSDNJk
modules.author: Sasmira

modules.name: ShowDragDistance
modules.title: Show Drag Distance
modules.description:
Bugfixes: Fixed issue where users couldn't pan after another player moved their token. 
 MAJOR OVERHAUL: Rebuilt from the ground up. Please submit an issue on github if you find one. Shows the distance you're dragging a token, similar to holding the ctrl key. Because 30 feet isn't as much as it sounds. Also removes the contraint of the normal ruler to hold CTRL and drag from Token. Now you can just press CTRL with token selected and it will show you the range from your token to mouse!

modules.name: lazymoney
modules.title: Lazy Money
modules.description: Easily add or remove currency with automatic conversion and no overdraft.

modules.name: multilevel-tokens
modules.title: Multilevel Tokens
modules.description:
Allows you to mark out linked regions on the map. Tokens present in the source region will be automatically cloned to the target region, and kept up-to-date with the original, mirroring movement and other changes.

Ideal for multi-level maps, for example so that tokens on a floor below are visible from a balcony above, and more!

Also adds a simple token teleportation system that works in a similar way.

See page at URL below for full usage instructions.
modules.author: grandseiken

modules.name: module-settings-sorter
modules.title: Module Settings Sorter
modules.description: Sorts the Module Settings window alphabetically
modules.author: Eadorin

modules.title: MyTab
modules.description: Change the title and the icon of your browsertab

modules.name: mountup

modules.title: Follow Me!
